title: unakku nigazh nIyE
sahitya:
unakku nigar nIyE umai annaiyE!

tanakkuvamai kANA shivanukkEdAram Ana  

anupallavi  

kaNamum undan kazhaL maRandaRiyEnE

tuNai nI enRE tudi seydEnE  

caraNam (madhyama kAlam)  

kAma krOda lOpAdi pApangaLaiyE

yAmaRindaRiyAmalum seyyAdirundiDavE

nImanam kanindE emai taDuttAT koNDiDavE

tAmadam tavirttu emai ANDaruL tAyE!
